Salm

Name: 1651: Upper Salm divided into Salm and Salm-Grumbach
1676: Salm divided into Salm-Salm and Salm-Kyrburg

Name: Salm-Blankenburg

Name: Salm-DhaunSalm-DaunForest and Rhine Count of Salm in Dhaun
Notes: 1263: Separated from Upper Salm1499-1574: Part of Salm1574: Partitioned into itself, Salm-Grumbach and Salm-Salm1697: Partitioned into itself and Salm-Puttlingen1750: Part of Salm-Grumbach1750: Annexed to Salm-Puttlingen1815: To Prussia

Name: Salm-Grumbach
